text: James Holley Douglas (born June 21, 1951) is an American politician and academic. He is a Republican. He was elected the 80th governor of the state of Vermont in 2002 and was reelected three times with a majority of the vote. He left the office in January 2011. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Academics from Vermont Category:Governors of Vermont Category:Living people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Springfield, Massachusetts Category:Politicians from Massachusetts
title: Jim Douglas
